00040 void BlockCompressionHeader::encode(uint8_t **bufp) {
00041   uint8_t *base = *bufp;
00042   memcpy(*bufp, m_magic, 10);
00043   (*bufp) += 10;
00044   *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)length();
00045   *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)m_compression_type;
00046   encode_i32(bufp, m_data_checksum);
00047   encode_i32(bufp, m_data_length);
00048   encode_i32(bufp, m_data_zlength);
00049 
00050   if ((size_t)(*bufp - base) + 2 == length())
00051     write_header_checksum(base, bufp);
00052 }
00053 
00054 void BlockCompressionHeader::write_header_checksum(uint8_t *base, uint8_t **bufp) {
00055   uint16_t checksum16 = fletcher32(base, *bufp-base);
00056   encode_i16(bufp, checksum16);
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00062 void BlockCompressionHeader::decode(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) {
00063   const uint8_t *base = *bufp;
00064   uint16_t header_length;
00065 
00066   if (*remainp < length())
00067     HT_THROW(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_TRUNCATED, "");
00068 
00069   // verify checksum
00070   uint16_t header_checksum, header_checksum_computed;
00071   size_t remaining = 2;
00072   const uint8_t *ptr = *bufp + length() - 2;
00073   header_checksum_computed = fletcher32(*bufp, length() - 2);
00074   header_checksum = decode_i16(&ptr, &remaining);
00075 
00076   if (header_checksum_computed != header_checksum)
00077     HT_THROW(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_HEADER, "Header checksum mismatch");
00078 
00079   memcpy(m_magic, *bufp, 10);
00080   (*bufp) += 10;
00081   *remainp -= 10;
00082 
00083   header_length = decode_byte(bufp, remainp);
00084 
00085   if (header_length != length())
00086     HT_THROWF(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_HEADER, "Unexpected header length"
00087               ": %lu, expecting: %lu", (Lu)header_length, (Lu)length());
00088 
00089   m_compression_type = decode_byte(bufp, remainp);
00090 
00091   if (m_compression_type >= BlockCompressionCodec::COMPRESSION_TYPE_LIMIT)
00092     HT_THROWF(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_HEADER, "Bad compression type: %d",
00093               (int)m_compression_type);
00094 
00095   m_data_checksum = decode_i32(bufp, remainp);
00096   m_data_length = decode_i32(bufp, remainp);
00097   m_data_zlength = decode_i32(bufp, remainp);
00098 
00099   if ((size_t)(*bufp - base) == length() - 2) {
00100     *bufp += 2;
00101     *remainp -= 2;
00102   }
00103 }
